dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT s.insert_date sortone, s.shipment_gid || 'A' sorter, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, s.shipment_type_gid shipment_type, glog_util.remove_domain(s.original_shipment_gid) primary_shipment, sref1.shipment_refnum_value charge_type, ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base * 0.0004536,3) actual_weight, TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_actual_cost,2),'999,999,990.00') actual_cost, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity, TO_CHAR(s.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') delivery_date, loc1.city dest_city, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' THEN con.contact_xid END) so_customer, loc1.province_code dest_state, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' THEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ssu.received_ship_unit_count) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) END) first_equip_group, TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_actual_cost_base,3),'999,999,990.000') freight, TO_CHAR(s.insert_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') insert_dt, sref3.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, s.transport_mode_gid trans_mode, loc2.city origin_city, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' THEN '' ELSE con.contact_xid END) po_customer, glog_util.remove_domain(s.servprov_gid) serv_prov, TO_CHAR(s.start_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') ship_date, TO_CHAR(s.insert_date,'fmMM') month_num, TO_CHAR(s.insert_date,'YYYY') year_num FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARGE TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION SELECT s.insert_date sortone, sh.original_shipment_gid || 'B' sorter, sh.shipment_xid shipment_id, sh.shipment_type_gid shipment_type, glog_util.remove_domain(sh.original_shipment_gid) primary_shipment, sref1.shipment_refnum_value charge_type, ROUND(sh.total_net_weight_base * 0.0004536,3) actual_weight, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.total_actual_cost,2),'999,999,990.00') actual_cost, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity, TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') delivery_date, loc1.city dest_city, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' THEN con.contact_xid END) so_customer, loc1.province_code dest_state, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' THEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ssu.received_ship_unit_count) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE glog_util.remove_domain(sh.first_equipment_group_gid) END) first_equip_group, '0.000' freight, TO_CHAR(sh.insert_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') insert_dt, sref3.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, sh.transport_mode_gid trans_mode, loc2.city origin_city, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' THEN '' ELSE con.contact_xid END) po_customer, glog_util.remove_domain(sh.servprov_gid) serv_prov, TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') ship_date, TO_CHAR(sh.insert_date,'fmMM') month_num, TO_CHAR(sh.insert_date,'YYYY') year_num FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN shipment sh ON s.shipment_gid = sh.original_shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARGE TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON sh.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY sortone DESC, sorter
